metadata.title: CVE-2014-2668 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Apache CouchDB 1.5.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (CPU and memory consumption) via the count parameter to /_uuids.

criterions.comment: couchdb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
